name: Coffee Attribute Extractor
content: Extract attributes from the given coffee product description. Return the result as a JSON object with the following structure: {"Brand": "...", "Origin": "...", "RoastLevel": "...", "FlavorNotes": [...], "Weight": "...", "Price": "...", "GrindType": "...", "Organic": true/false, "FairTrade": true/false}. Use "Unknown" if an attribute is not mentioned. For Coffee Pods, include "PodsPerPack" and "CompatibleMachines" instead of "Weight" and "GrindType". For Coffee Makers, use {"Brand": "...", "Type": "...", "Capacity": "...", "Price": "...", "Features": [...], "Color": "...", "Warranty": "..."}.

name: Coffee Categorizer
content: Categorize the given coffee product into appropriate categories and subcategories. Return the result as a JSON object with the following structure: {"Category": "Food", "Subcategory": "Coffee", "SubSubcategory": "..."}. Choose from: "Coffee Beans", "Coffee Pods", or "Coffee Makers" for the SubSubcategory.
